com.attributestudios.minecraft.installer

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.attributestudios.minecraft.installer.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that stores all settings enabled by the command line switches. Also has a command line help option.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Bridger Maskrey (maskreybe@live.com)
    Date:
    2014-08-12

      Fields

      static com.attributestudios.api.util.ConfigurationLoader config
      Loads the default settings as defined in the configuration file.
      private static ModImage splashScreenImage
      The image to display on the splash screen
      private static boolean updateDropbox
      Boolean determining whether or not the program should attempt to zip all updates that do not yet have an associated zip file.
